articles.title: July core sector output grows at 9.4% even as the low base effect wanes - Economic Times
articles.description: The core sector output grew 9.4% despite a waning base effect. ​​​The core sector output comprises of the eight prime industries namely coal, crude oil, natural gas, refinery products, steel, cement, fertilizer and electricity.
articles.content:
The output of eight core sectors rose by 9.4%, in July on the back of low base seen in the corresponding month of 2021.

articles.title: April-July Fiscal Deficit At About A Fifth Of Budget Estimate - BloombergQuint
